author: gmelachr
body:
We open this PR  to solve the issues discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48332
Despite the fact that this issue was not reported for the production release, we will backport these changes in the master release. 

There are also few changes on the code to solve some minor issues based on the feedback we received from the BPH experts. 

FYI: @drkovalskyi  @gkaratha @vmariani
title: Update for BPHNano to solve issues with different compilers
